title: Delicious
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Western, Fast food, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Khmer, Cambodian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Small, family-owned restaurant near the beach on the main road. Very convenient to shopping, the beach and hotels. Large menu with fresh fruit, salads, and juices. Cuisines served include Thai, Malaysian, Cambodian, Halal and Indian. Staff speaks English.
